Welcome to Ireaneus Linux Cheat Sheets webpage

Linux command line cheat sheets website

View on GitHub

Install a package locally

bower install

Install a package locally directly from github

bower install /

Install a specific package locally

bower install #

Install a package locally and save installed package into bower.json

bower install --save

Retrieve info of a particular package

bower info

List local packages

bower list

Search for a package by name

bower search

Update a package to their newest version

bower update

Remove a local package

bower uninstall
